articles.description: Manchester City suffer a fresh injury blow as defender Ruben Dias is ruled out for "three or four weeks" with a muscle injury.
articles.title: Ruben Dias: Manchester City defender ruled out for 'three or four weeks'

articles.description: From champion Oleksandr Usyk's unwanted 5am wake-ups to Tyson Fury's short-lived humbleness, BBC Sport previews Saturday's heavyweight blockbuster.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Heavyweight rivalry for the ages continues in Saudi Arabia on Saturday

articles.description: Goalkeepers Fraser Forster and Altay Bayindir both have a night to forget during Tottenham's 4-3 win over Manchester United.
articles.title: Tottenham 4-3 Man Utd: Fraser Forster & Altay Bayindir questioned after mistakes

articles.description: Manchester United forward Mason Mount will be out for "several weeks" with a leg injury, says manager Ruben Amorim.
articles.title: Mason Mount injury: Man Utd forward will be out for 'several weeks'

articles.description: Marc Guiu, 18, could be a "big star" for Chelsea after scoring a hat-trick against Shamrock Rovers in the Conference League.
articles.title: Marc Guiu: Chelsea striker showing Barcelona's 'mistake' is Blues' gain

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Reverend & the Makers singer Jon McClure with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v Reverend & the Makers singer Jon McClure.

articles.description: Warren Gatland will continue as Wales head coach for the 2025 Six Nations despite Welsh Rugby Union chief executive Abi Tierney admitting his position had been "on the line".
articles.title: Warren Gatland: Wales coach to stay on for 2025 Six Nations

articles.description: World 5,000m silver medallist Mohamed Katir receives a four-year ban for tampering after being found to have falsified travel documents.
articles.title: Mohamed Katir: World 5,000m silver medallist handed four-year ban for tampering

articles.description: Southampton are said to be close to appointing Croatian former Roma boss Ivan Juric as their manager.
articles.title: Southampton close to appointing Ivan Juric as new manager

articles.description: Frenchman Isack Hadjar is promoted to Red Bull's second team to race alongside Japanese Yuki Tsunoda during the 2025 Formula 1 season.
articles.title: Formula 1: Isack Hadjar to race for Racing Bulls
